# 难想的又没什么模板的思路题
1. 287 寻找中位数
* 思路：环形链表找到环节点，slow fast快慢指针， 数组值相当于 next指针 slow = nums[slow], fast = nums[nums[fast]], 当快慢指针相遇时，fast = 0， 变为慢指针fast = nums[fast]。再次相遇时 slow就是要寻找的数字 nums[slow]

```cpp
    int findDuplicate(vector<int>& nums) {
        
        int fast = 0,slow = 0;
        while(true)
        {
            fast = nums[nums[fast]];
            slow = nums[slow];
            if(fast == slow){
                fast = 0;
                while(slow != fast){
                    slow = nums[slow];
                    fast = nums[fast];
                }
                return slow;
            }
            
        }

        return 0;
    }

```
